alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 11 at 8:21AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Wisconsin, including the following counties, Outagamie and Waupaca. * WHEN...Until 930 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 819 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported minor flooding in the advisory area, due to 1 to 2 inches of heavy rain from earlier this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... New London, Manawa, Shiocton, Bear Creek, Ogdensburg, Sugar Bush, Fitzgerald Corners, Symco and Wolf River Bottoms Wildlife Area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
